amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $1,000,000 for the development of a Lightweight All Terrain Vehicle.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4837 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4837 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bennett. (consideration: CR S8674-8675; text: CR S8675) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $1,000,000 for the development of a Lightweight All Terrain Vehicle.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4837 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bennett.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4837 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
